ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_freq1 | |- ( R = S -> ( R Fr A <-> S Fr A ) ) |

| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_3bitr4g | |- ( R = S -> ( R We A <-> S We A ) ) |
